title: LG V40 Sprint saying device not play protect certified so it wont receive the android 10 update?
content: Ive updated all my PRL, Software, Apps, play store and carrier services.  I just bought this LG V40 and when I open play store it says ita not play protect certified.   Ive owned over a hundred phones and never had an LG phone say it wasnt Play protect certified so it wont recieve updates.  Can somebody please enlighten me
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
